titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 4-Vinylbenzenesulfonic acid, sodium salt hydrate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
12/12/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 4-Vinylbenzenesulfonic acid, sodium salt hydrate.
